name: segregationist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who agrees with a policy of segregation (= keeping groups of people apart and treating them differently, especially because of their race): Their votes helped to loosen the grip that Southern segregationists held on the party.
More examplesFewer examplesThe most serious opposition to the new law came from white segregationists.They were determined not to let violent segregationists disrupt the event.
